Text:
Thanks !

They better not have really killed Robin again !  I was just starting to like the runt.
Does anyone have a torrrent of the full RIP storyline thus far?   Is it not done yet?

across97, it's not really a storyline, it's just the various bat-titles are on a mourning theme after the events of batman incorporated 8. this issue of detective and worlds finest 10 are the only others that have come out. click on the link below and i guess you could consider the comics shown to be a thematically-linked "storyline" ...

http://www.bleedingcool.com/2013/02/28/when-dcs-batbook-covers-gently-weep/
